svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Log settler mortality vs GDP per capita (constant 2011 int-$), 2015
Gross domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in constant 2011 international dollars, versus the log of the
mortality rate faced by European settlers at the time of colonization.
Source: Acemoglu, Johnson & Robinson via the Quality of Government dataset, World Bank – WDI
